system.effect: Has two features. Deafen: All other ships in 30 VU's must make -10 Tech Use Test to use vox comms. Terrify: Characters on this ship gain +10 to Intimidate Tests against ships in 30 VU's. This component cannot be damaged/destroyed except via a critical hit. Only one per vessel.
